    • Method Detail

      • crossValidation

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,PerformanceMeasure> crossValidation(Dataset data,
                                                                 int numFolds,
                                                                 java.util.Random rg)
        Performs cross validation with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        data - the data set to use in the cross validation. This data set is split in the appropriate number of folds.
        numFolds - the number of folds to create
        rg - random generator to create the folds
        Returns:
        the results of the cross-validation.

      • crossValidation

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,PerformanceMeasure> crossValidation(Dataset data,
                                                                 int folds)
        Performs cross validation with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        data - the data set to use in the cross validation. This data set is split in the appropriate number of folds.
        numFolds - the number of folds to create
        Returns:
        the results of the cross-validation.

      • crossValidation

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,PerformanceMeasure> crossValidation(Dataset data)
        Performs cross validation with the specified parameters. By default the number of folds is 10.
        Parameters:
        data - the data set to use in the cross validation. This data set is split in the appropriate number of folds.
        Returns:
        the results of the cross-validation.
